LanguageData.Make_Patchleather.label: make patchleather
LanguageData.Make_Patchleather.description: Combine various types of leather to create weak patchleather.
LanguageData.MakeCloth.label: Spin cloth
LanguageData.MakeCloth.description: Spin cloth from raw cotton. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeLinen.label: Spin linen cloth
LanguageData.MakeLinen.description: Spin linen cloth from raw flax. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeLinen.jobString: Spinning linen cloth from raw flax.
LanguageData.MakeHempCloth.label: Spin hemp
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadCloth.label: Spin synthread
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadCloth.description: Spin synthread from raw cotton and synthetic fibers. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.label: Spin devilstrand cloth
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.description: Spin devilstrand cloth from synthetic fibers. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.jobString: Spinning devilstrand cloth from synthetic fibers.
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.label: Spin hyperweave
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.description: Spin hyperweave from synthread and devilstrand cloth. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.jobString: Spinning hyperweave from devilstrand and synthread.
LanguageData.MakeVelour.label: Spin velour
LanguageData.MakeVelour.description: Spin velour, a plush woven fabric resembling velvet, chiefly used for soft furnishings, casual clothing, and hats. Produces 25.
LanguageData.MakeKevlar.label: Create kevlar
LanguageData.MakeKevlar.description: Create kevlar from plastic and synthetic fibers. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeHexcell.label: Craft hex-cells
LanguageData.MakeHexcell.description: Craft hex-cells. These are used as power source in various pieces of high-tech armor. Produces 10.
